form.name: no_rutf_available_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Malnutrition> No RUTF Available Two

field.name: Does the child have any of the following signs or conditions?
Complicated severe acute malnutrition
field.options: For children < 6 months of age: | Visible severe wasting OR | Oedema of both feet For children ≥ 6 months of age: | MUAC < 11.5 cm OR | Oedema of both feet OR | Visible severe wasting | Click here to take action

field.name: Moderate acute malnutrition or underweight
field.options: For children ≥ 6 months of age: | MUAC 11.5 – < 12 cm OR | Weight for age < -2 z-score | Click here to take action

field.name: No acute malnutrition, and not underweight
field.options: For children ≥ 6 months of age: | MUAC > 12.5 cm OR | Weight for age > -2 z-score| Click here to take action
